column5: HYDRO ALERT - ONTARIO Ontario Power Generation (OPG) and Hydro One are warning customers of the rotating winter power blackouts that are expected to occur on: - Saturday March 4, 2006 - Tuesday, March 7, 2006 - Saturday, March 11, 2006 - Tuesday, March 14, 2006 This is a Province-wide alert. The lack of power seems to consistently occur just after 7 pm on Saturday or 7:30 pm weekdays and is attributed to the excessive power required to run the goal judge light behind the Toronto Maple Leaf net. Sincerely Yours, Ontario Power Generation and Hydro One
The Ravens are cawwwwing. Just ignore them and they might go away.
